Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation For Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Meridian Bioscience Revogene instrument with PMT cooling system and upgraded Windows 10-based software for automated nucleic acid amplification and detection by real-time PCR
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in performing nucleic acid testing of specific IVD assays in clinical laboratories, capable of automated lysis, dilution, amplification, and fluorescence-based real-time PCR detection of nucleic acids from various clinical specimen types
